description.narrative: Renewable Energy for Agriculture (RE4A) is a collaboration with Malawi Fruits, a social enterprise that supports farmers and connects them to markets, and African Mini Grids, a developer of energy installations. The project aims to develop a commercially viable model that supports solar irrigation for women-led horticulture and cold storage facilities. This funding opportunity would allow a pilot in one site. Other funding is being sourced to test it in other sites.

participating-org.narrative: Modern Farming Technology sub of Malawi Fruits Ltd Kevin Simpson ( CEO of Malawi Fruits)

mailing-address.narrative: The Robbins Building, 25 Albert Street, Rugby, Warwickshire, CV21 2SD, United Kingdom
